about_the_game:
Founders Package for Early Access users!
you can have the following 7 items permanently.

SR47 GL COBRA
MDR GL
SIZMPX
SR47 GL
DSR1
BRODY
AIM TIGHT name banner

*SR47 GL COBRA is exclusive skin (Only for Founders Package)

name: Black Squad - FOUNDER'S PACKAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Founders Package for Early Access users! you can have the following 7 items permanently.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
*languages with full audio support
